title: Was the collective shooting in Dayton "the pro - demon leftist who supported Elizabeth Warren "?
subtitle: The armed accused Dayton promoted several cases and progressive candidates.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: :: Connor Bates, suspected of mass shooting in Dayton in August 2019, described himself on the social media as a leftist, expressed the views of "a supporter of the devil," and expressed his support for Elizabeth Warren.
